ygData.subject: Re: OOPS  Accidental Kill Steal.
ygData.msgSnippet: there s ur problem bob.  dont use rich text. and dont use colors. our readers (outlook express) and some others have the ability to read rich text without a
ygData.messageBody:
there's ur problem bob. dont use rich text. and dont use colors. our
readers (outlook express) and some others have the ability to read rich text
without a problem, but others dont. it will come across *jarbled*.

-----Original Message-----
From: Bob <vampyre@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, June 28, 1999 1:51 AM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] OOPS Accidental Kill Steal.


>From: Bob <vampyre@...>
>
>I am using outlook express. A fairly standard mail reader I assume. It
was
>set in rich text(html) settings i was using chancelor font in red to go
>with my 'Vampyre' nick name. Now I am in plain text mode. Very bnoring but
>maybe easir for everyone to read. Let's see if this works.
>
